tool.name: Tesseract Video OCR
tool.description: Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract on frames of a video

param.name: dedupe
param.label: Dedupe
param.help: Whether to dedupe consecutive frames with same texts

param.name: period
param.label: Period
param.help: Period in seconds to last as consecutive duplicate frames

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract on frames of a video extracted with FFMpeg. If "dedupe" option is checked, also generate AMP OCRR JSON with duplicate frames removed, i.e. consecutive frames with same texts within the specified period.
